content.text: Traditional indexes are 1D. Multimedia data is multi-dimensional. This topic covers the spatial data structures needed to find similar media quickly.

formula.description: The Lower Bounding Lemma: To guarantee no false dismissals during dimensionality reduction, the distance in the reduced feature space must be less than or equal to the distance in the original high-dimensional space.
